name: Vertical Measures
tagline: More Traffic. More Leads. More Business.
description:
With decades of combined experience, Vertical Measures’ SEO team is dedicated to learning the ins and outs of your business, your overall objectives and what it is that makes your business tick. We look at our search engine optimization services holistically, customizing based on your specific needs and priorities, all the while keeping an eye on the ever-changing search landscape. We offer a range of services that we build into our customized SEO offerings, including:
Onsite SEO Audit: This is a highly technical audit examining the onsite SEO health of your core web pages. You’ll walk away with actionable steps to help improve your SEO performance.
Backlink Analysis & Link Removals: We’ll work to discover toxic backlinks that are holding you back from success, and develop tactical approaches for removal of backlinks and reclamation.
Keyword Research & Canonical Mapping: Strategic keyword research uncovers the best keywords your customers are using today, those already ranking and strengthens their importance on your site.
Website Analytics Services: To know where you need to go, you need to know where you are now. We’ll assist you in measuring your efforts online, an integral part of any holistic program.
Local Search & Citation Audits: We’ll target your customers and prospects with local specific keywords, increasing your visibility and driving traffic.
Automation SEO Analysis: We’ll help you understand how marketing automation and search can work together for maximum success.
Whether you have lofty goals to increase your organic search traffic next quarter, or have a site that’s been penalized, our team has a proven track record of success. We understand the power of search engine optimization to transform your organization’s results. We are your partner every step of the way in driving more traffic, more leads, and more business.
